jobs.description: We are seeking a highly skilled software engineer to join our team in developing innovative solutions for our users. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in computer science and experience with modern programming languages and frameworks.
requirements: BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or related field
Strong proficiency in a modern programming language (e.g. Java, Python, C++)
Experience with software development tools and practices (e.g. version control, testing, debugging)

jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced aerospace engineer to work on cutting-edge projects in space exploration and research. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in mechanical and aerospace engineering and experience with complex systems and technologies.
requirements: BS/MS/PhD in Aerospace or Mechanical Engineering
Experience with design and analysis of complex systems (e.g. rockets, satellites, space probes)
Proficiency in engineering software tools and technologies (e.g. CAD, FEA, CFD)

jobs.description: We are seeking a talented electrical engineer to join our team in designing and developing cutting-edge electric vehicles and energy products. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in electrical engineering and experience with power electronics and control systems.
requirements: BS/MS/PhD in Electrical Engineering or related field
Experience with power electronics and control systems (e.g. motor drives, inverters, battery management systems)
Proficiency in electrical design and simulation tools (e.g. Altium, SPICE)

jobs.description: We are seeking a highly motivated machine learning engineer to work on our cutting-edge AI technologies. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in machine learning, deep learning, and computer vision.
requirements: BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or related field
Strong proficiency in machine learning and deep learning (e.g. TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Experience with computer vision and image processing (e.g. OpenCV)
